1: <pb/>Ri Ajawaxel xutzijobej ri Moises, xukuje' ri Aaron, xubij chque:
2: <pb/>“Aretak jun winak c'o sipoj chrij ri u tz'umal, o pok', o sakrek', o ch'a'c ri cäjunamataj ruc' ri chuwilaj ch'a'c, rajawaxic cäc'am ulok chuwäch ri Aaron ri cojol tabal tok'ob o chuwäch jun chque ri e cojol tabal tok'ob ri e rija'lil ri Aaron.
3: <pb/>Ri cojol tabal tok'ob cunic'oj ri ch'a'c ri c'o chrij ri u tz'umal, we sakarinak ri rismal ri c'o pa ri ch'a'c, we mecmobinak ri ch'a'c pa ri u tz'umal, jic chi chuwilaj ch'a'c wa'. Aretak nic'otajinak chic we winak ri' rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob, cuk'alajisaj chi c'o chuwilaj ch'a'c chrij.
4: <pb/>We c'o sakrek' chrij ri u tz'umal, man mecmobinak ta c'u chuxe' ri u tz'umal mawi sakarinak ri rismal, ri cojol tabal tok'ob wukub k'ij cutz'apij na ri ch'aquirinak pa jun ja.
5: <pb/>Aretak cätz'akat wukub k'ij cunic'oj na ri cojol tabal tok'ob; we xak je wi u banom ri ch'a'c, man u jabum ta rib chrij ri u tz'umal, cätz'apix chi na wukub k'ij rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob.
6: <pb/>Aretak cätz'akat ri wukub k'ij cänic'ox chi jumul rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob; we c'u cätajin cäsach ri ch'a'c, man c'u u jabum ta rib chrij ri u tz'umal ri winak, Ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi man c'o ta chuwilaj ch'a'c chrij xak pok' wa' ri xq'uiy che ri u tz'umal. Ri yawab quebuch'aj ri ratz'iak, cäcanaj c'u ch'ajch'oj.
7: <pb/>We c'u cujabuj rib ri pok' chrij ri u tz'umal aretak nic'om chic ri yawab, xukuje' k'alajisam chic rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob chi man c'o ta u yab; rajawaxic cäbe chi na jumul ruc' ri cojol tabal tok'ob, rech cänic'ox rumal.
8: <pb/><f>[3]</f>We c'u aretak cänic'otaj ri yawab rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob, caril c'ut chi u jabum rib ri pok' chrij ri u tz'umal, cuk'alajisaj na chi tz'il; yawab c'o chuwilaj ch'a'c chrij.
9: <pb/>Aretak jun winak c'o u ch'aquil chuwilaj ch'a'c chrij, rajawaxic cäc'am bic chuwäch ri cojol tabal tok'ob.
10: <pb/>Cänic'ox rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob, we c'u sak ri sipoj ri c'o che ri u tz'umal u banom c'ut chi ri rismal cätajin cäsakaric, we c'u quilitaj ri quiäkalaj ti'j pa ri sipoj,
11: <pb/>chuwilaj ch'a'c wa' ri u ruxubem ri u tz'umal. Ri cojol tabal tok'ob rajawaxic cuk'alajisaj chi tz'il we winak ri', man rajawaxic ta chic cutz'apij, tz'ilotajinak chic.
12: <pb/>We c'u cänimataj ri chuwilaj ch'a'c ruc' aninakil, chi quebuch'uk ri rakan xukuje' ri u jolom ri yawab c'ä jawije' ri cacuin wi ri cojol tabal tok'ob che rilic,
13: <pb/>ri cojol tabal tok'ob cunic'oj na; we c'u ch'ukutajinak ronojel ri u cuerp rumal ri ch'a'c ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi man c'o ta u yab, sakarinak c'u ri ch'a'c canajinak ch'ajch'oj.
14: <pb/>Apachique c'u k'ij, ri cäc'utun ri quiäk ti'j, cäcanaj tz'il.
15: <pb/>Cunic'oj c'u ri cojol tabal tok'ob ri quiäk ti'j, cuk'alajisaj chi c'o u yab ri winak. Ri quiäk ti'j u tz'ilol chuwilaj ch'a'c wa'.
16: <pb/>We c'u ne cuq'uex rib ri quiäk ti'j, cäsakar chi jumul, ri yawab rajawaxic cuc'utu chi na rib chuwäch ri cojol tabal tok'ob
17: <pb/>rech cunic'oj, we c'u carilo chi ri ch'a'c sakarinak chi jumul, cuk'alajisaj chi man c'o ta u yab we winak ri', canajinak c'u ch'ajch'oj.
18: <pb/>Aretak c'o jachin jun c'o jun chuwilaj ch'a'c chrij ri u tz'umal cäcunataj c'ut,
19: <pb/>cäcanaj c'u can jun sak sipoj pa ri u c'olbal, o jun quiäk sakrek', rajawaxic cuc'utu' rib chuwäch ri cojol tabal tok'ob.
20: <pb/>We ri cojol tabal tok'ob; carilo chi ri u rikom wi ri c'axc'obic mecmobinak pa ri u tz'umal, sakarinak c'u ri rismal, ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi tz'il we winak ri', u ch'aquil chuwilaj ch'a'c wa' ri c'o che.
21: <pb/>We carilo chi ri xc'oji' wi ri chuwilaj ch'a'c man c'o ta rismal ri sakarinak chupam, mawi mecmobinak pa ri u tz'umal, xane' xa benak rutziric, wukub k'ij cutz'apij na we winak ri' pa jun ja.
22: <pb/>We c'u cätajin cujabuj rib ri yabil chrij ri u tz'umal, ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi c'o u yab we winak ri', u ch'aquil chuwilaj ch'a'c wa' ri c'o chrij.
23: <pb/>We c'u ri xc'oji' wi ri chuwilaj ch'a'c man u jabum ta rib, xak u yuquil ri ch'a'c wa', ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi man c'o ta u yab we winak ri'.
24: <pb/>Aretak c'o jun c'atic chrij ri u tz'umal jun winak, we c'u c'o jun sakrek', o sak chuwäch ri quiäk ti'j,
25: <pb/>cunic'oj na ri cojol tabal tok'ob; we c'u sakarinak ri rismal pa ri c'atic, mecmobinak c'u pa ri u tz'umal, chuwilaj ch'a'c wa' ri xq'uiy ulok pa ri c'atic; ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi tz'il u ch'aquil chuwilaj ch'a'c c'ut ri c'o chrij.
26: <pb/>We c'u aretak cunic'oj ri cojol tabal tok'ob ri c'atic, carilo chi man c'o ta jun sak rismal pa ri c'atic mawi mecmobinak pa ri u tz'umal, xane' benak rutziric wukub k'ij cutz'apij na pa jun ja,
27: <pb/>aretak catz'akat ri wukub k'ij cänic'ox rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob; we c'u u jabum rib ri yabil chrij ri u tz'umal, cuk'alajisaj chi tz'il we winak ri', u ch'aquil chuwilaj ch'a'c wa' ri c'o chrij.
28: <pb/>We c'u ri c'atic man cujabuj ta rib chrij ri u tz'umal, xane' benak rutziric, xa u sipoj ri c'atic wa' ri xcanajic, xa jeri', ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi ch'ajch'oj ri yawab, xa c'u u yuquil ri c'atic.
29: <pb/>We jun achi o jun ixok c'o jun ch'a'c che ri u jolom o che ri u cacate',
30: <pb/>ri cojol tabal tok'ob cunic'oj ri ch'a'c, we ri ch'a'c mecmobinak pa ri u tz'umal, k'anarinak c'u ri rismal xukuje' xak cäwalalic, ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi tz'il we winak ri', c'o quiäkchi'n che, ri u bixic ch'a'c re jolomaj xukuje' re cacate'.
31: <pb/>We c'u aretak cänic'ox ri ch'a'c ri quiäkchi'n rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob, carilo chi we man mecmobinak ta pa ri u tz'umal, mawi c'o k'ek rismal, cutz'apij na wukub k'ij we winak ri' chupam jun ja.
32: <pb/>Aretak catz'akat wukub k'ij cänic'ox ri ch'a'c rumal ri cojol tabal tok'ob; we c'u man u jabum rib ri quiäkchi'n mawi mecmobinak pa ri u tz'umal, mawi k'anarinak ri rismal.
33: <pb/>Ri cojol tabal tok'ob cubij che ri winak ri yawab chi cäsocax ri u wi', man cäsocax ta c'u ri c'o wi ri quiäkchi'n ch'a'c cutz'apij chi na wukub k'ij pa jun ja.
34: <pb/>Aretak cätz'akat wukub k'ij, ri cojol tabal tok'ob cunic'oj chi na ri ch'a'c jumul, we c'u man u jubum rib ri quiäkchi'n mawi mecmobinak pa ri u tz'umal, ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj chi ch'ajch'oj we ri winak ri', quebuch'aj ri ratz'iak, cäcanaj c'u ch'ajch'oj.
35: <pb/>We c'u ri quiäkchi'n cujabuj rib chrij ri u tz'umal, aretak k'alajisam chic, chi ch'ajch'oj.
36: <pb/>Ri cojol tabal tok'ob cunic'oj chi jumul ri winak ri yawab, we c'u u jabum rib ri quiäkchi'n chrij ri u tz'umal, man rajawaxic ta chic cutzucuj ri wi'aj ri k'ank'oj, tz'il wa'.
37: <pb/>We c'u caril ri cojol tabal tok'ob chi ri quiäkchi'n man u jabum ta rib, q'uiyinak c'u ulok ri k'ek ismal chupam, cunatajinak chic ri quiäkchi'n, ri winak ch'ajch'oj. Are c'u ri cojol tabal tok'ob cuk'alajisaj na chi ch'ajch'oj.
38: <pb/>We jun achi we jun ixok e c'o sakrek' chrij ri u tz'umal,
39: <pb/>ri cojol tabal tok'ob, cunic'oj ri u tz'umal, we carilo chi c'o etal saksoj we sak macalic pa ri sakrek'; xak apachique sipoj wa' ri q'uiyinak chrij ri u tz'umal; ch'ajch'oj we winak ri'.
40: <pb/>We jun winak cätzak ri u wi', cäcanaj c'u ch'a'n, ch'ajch'oj wa'.
41: <pb/>We ri u wi' ri c'o chuwäch cäk'ulk'ubic cach'anar c'u chuwäch, xukuje' ch'ajch'oj.
42: <pb/>We c'u cäc'utun jun ch'a'c ri sak quiäk cäca'yic pa tak ri c'olbal ri e ch'anach'oj, we chrij u wi' we chuwäch, xa cätajin caq'uiy ulok chuwilaj ch'a'c chila'.
43: <pb/>Cunic'oj c'u ri cojol tabal tok'ob, we c'u ri sipoj re ri ch'a'c ri c'o pa tak ri ch'ajch'oj sak quiäk cäca'yic, je jas ri rilic ri chuwilaj ch'a'c che ri u tz'umal ri cuerp.
44: <pb/>We winak ri' yawab che chuwilaj chac', ch'acarinak ri u jolom. Jun winak wa' ri tz'il, je u k'alajisaxic cuban na ri cojol tabal tok'ob.
45: <pb/>Ri winak ri ch'aquirinak che chuwilaj ch'a'c, jisjobinak tak atz'iak cucojo xukuje' man cuch'uk ta ri u jolom, ch'ukutal jubik' ri u palaj curak u chi', cubij: ‘¡In tz'il! ¡In tz'il!’
46: <pb/>Joropa' k'ij cäc'oji' ri chuwilaj ch'a'c chrij, cachomaxic chi tz'il, cutuquela'j rib chrij ri tinimit.
47: <pb/>Aretak cac'utun jun tz'aj che jun atz'iak, we re rismal chij o re lino,
48: <pb/>o che jun quem, re lino o re rismal chij, o che jun tz'um, o che apachique jasach re tz'um
49: <pb/>we ri tz'aj ri c'o chque we jastak ri' räxroj o quiäkcoj, ri tz'aj ri' chuwilaj ch'a'c wa', takal u c'utic chuwäch ri cojol tabal tok'ob.
50: <pb/>Ri cojol tabal tok'ob cunic'oj na ri tz'aj, cutz'apij c'u na wukub k'ij ri jasach ri tz'ajtajinak.
51: <pb/>Aretak catz'akat wukub k'ij cunic'oj ri tz'aj; we u jabum rib chrij ri atz'iak, chrij ri rakan quem o u wa' quem, o che ri tz'um o jun jasach re tz'um, ri tz'aj chuwilaj ch'a'c wa' e are tak c'ut ri jastak e tz'il wa'.
52: <pb/>Je c'u ri' apachique jasach ri c'o we tz'aj ri' che chuwilaj ch'a'c wa', rajawaxic u poroxic ronojel, chuwilaj ch'a'c wa'.
53: <pb/>We c'u cunic'oj ri cojol tabal tok'ob, cäriktaj c'ut chi man u jabum ta rib, ri tz'aj,
54: <pb/>cuya' takanic chi cäch'aj ri tz'aj cätz'apix chi na wukub k'ij ri jasach ri' pa jun ja.
55: <pb/>Aretak ch'ajtajinak chic ri tz'aj cunic'oj ri cojol tabal tok'ob. We c'u cärilo chi ri tz'aj man sachinak taj, tz'aj, ri jasach takal u poroxic, pune' ri tz'aj man u jabum ta rib, xa benak chupam, we chupam c'o wi xukuje' we chrij c'o wi.
56: <pb/>We c'u aretak cunic'oj ri cojol tabal tok'ob, cärilo chi ri tz'aj sachinak aretak ch'ajom chic, cukupij apam we ch'akap ri' che ri atz'iak, che ri tz'um o che ri quem.
57: <pb/>We c'u cuc'ut chi rib jumul chrij ri atz'iak, o chrij ri quem o chrij apachique jasach re tz'um, cäporox we jasach ri' ri tz'ajtajinak.
58: <pb/>Are c'u ri atz'iak, ri quem, o apachique jasach re tz'um, ri quel wi ri tz'aj aretak cäch'ajic, cäcamulix u ch'ajic cäcanaj c'u can ch'ajch'oj.”
59: <pb/>Aretak wa' ri pixab chquij ri tz'aj re chuwilaj ch'a'c chque tak ri atz'iak re rismal chij o re lino, o chque quem, o chque jastak re tz'um, rech cuya' quek'alajisaxic chi e ch'ajch'oj o e tz'il.
